tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TenantData (
    tenant_id INT,
    data_id BIGINT,
    data VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Tenant (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE TenantUser (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
tenant_id INT NOT NULL,
username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (tenant_id) REFERENCES Tenant(id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE TenantSettings (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
tenant_id INT NOT NULL,
setting_key VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
setting_value JSONB,
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (tenant_id) REFERENCES Tenant(id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE TenantData (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
tenant_id INT NOT NULL,
data_key VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
data_value JSONB,
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (tenant_id) REFERENCES Tenant(id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE TenantLog (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
tenant_id INT NOT NULL,
log_message TEXT NOT NULL,
log_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (tenant_id) REFERENCES Tenant(id) ON DELETE CASCADE)
